moves.details: Analyze '/api/mcp/config/route.ts' and '/api/mcp-config/route.ts'. Determine the canonical route, delete the redundant one and its associated analysis notes.
Review all attached API routes and document every instance of missing authentication and authorization checks.
Review all attached API routes and document every instance where 'console.log' or 'console.error' is used instead of the structured 'appLogger'.
Review all attached API routes and document instances of inconsistent error handling, such as returning a 200 OK status on a server-side failure.
Perform a final pass over all routes to identify any other opportunities for enhancement, simplification, or alignment with best practices.
Summarize all findings from the previous moves into a comprehensive report outlining all identified issues and recommended actions.
